Beast-Surrounding Maneuver.name: Beast-Surrounding Maneuver
Beast-Surrounding Maneuver.flavor: You and an ally skim along the enemy’s flank, stabbing as you go.
Beast-Surrounding Maneuver.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.
Beast-Surrounding Maneuver.effect: Shift 1 square and make the secondary attack. If the target is a dragon, you can instead shift 3 squares.
Beast-Surrounding Maneuver.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 1 square and make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action. If the target is a dragon, the ally can instead shift 3 squares.

Hit Him Where it Hurts!.name: Hit Him Where it Hurts!
Hit Him Where it Hurts!.flavor: With a shout, you direct your ally’s blow where it will inflict the most harm.
Hit Him Where it Hurts!.trigger: An ally in the burst attacks an enemy
Hit Him Where it Hurts!.onHit: The attack scores a critical on a natural roll of 19 or 20. If the target is a dragon, it scores a critical on a natural roll of 18, 19, or 20.

Breath-Taking Slam.name: Breath-Taking Slam
Breath-Taking Slam.flavor: You and your allies are ready to strike at the first sign of the dragon’s breath.
Breath-Taking Slam.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until you end your turn in a square not adjacent to the target, when the target makes a close attack, you and each ally adjacent to it can make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt. If the target is a dragon, it takes a –1 penalty to the triggering attack for each such melee basic attack that hits.
